quote: I think I like wildflowers best,"" I explain. ""They just grow wherever they want. No one has to plant them. And then their seeds blow in the wind and they find a new place to grow."" (Richelle)
quote_letters: I THINK I LIKE WILDFLOWERS BEST I EXPLAIN THEY JUST GROW WHEREVER THEY WANT NO ONE HAS TO PLANT THEM AND THEN THEIR SEEDS BLOW IN THE WIND AND THEY FIND A NEW PLACE TO GROW RICHELLE
